    • Constructor Detail

      • HealthBar

        public HealthBar​(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc,
                 javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas,
                 double x,
                 double y,
                 int health)
        This is the healthbar constructor, it creates an instance of the healthbar class
        Parameters:
        gc - This is for the GraphicsContext to allow drawing on the canvas
        canvas - This is the canvas, and FXML object that is linked to the .fxml file as an ID for the canvas
        x - an x position
        y - a y position
        health - The amount of health

        Drawing an updated healthbard
        Parameters:
        amount - draws it based on the give integer amount
